review_data.title: Just perfect for a pause ...
review_data.content: ... during a sightseeing stroll through the Old Town of Zurich. The service is attentive. The food is very affordable and of reasonable quality.

review_data.title: Wonderful Experience

review_data.title: A hidden gem in Old Town

review_data.title: Family and Friends Dinner
review_data.content: We had a party of 7 and made reservation's. The staff was accommodating and friendly. Everyone enjoyed their meal. It was reasonably priced by Zurich standards. I'm glad we found this gem.

review_data.title: Don't have high expectations

review_data.title: Well, average
review_data.content: Food was good, also the beer from some local microbewery. Reasonable pricing. Service neither very fast nor very friendly, however. All in all, an average experience.

review_data.title: Good coffee
review_data.content: We wanted to have a coffee while sightseeing in Zürich and this place was a good choice. Good service and coffee. I had cheesecake as well, big piece, but not the best cake I have tasted.

review_data.title: Inexpensive lunch
review_data.content: Good for lunch. A quirky place recommended by a local. Inexpensive for Zurich. One oddity was a charge for tap water.
